channel.title: Xp rates + Spawn on new character on Allstar?
channel.description: Anyone know how i can change the XP rates of skills + combat and when you make a new character you spawn in 1 place but i changed all the others to my new home, anyone also know how i can change the coords you spawn at when you make a new char?

item.title: Xp rates + Spawn on new character on Allstar?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

cheers, changed it, anyone know about the xp rate?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 07:36:13 am[/size][hr]Tysm, it worked:) + Xp rates anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Xp rates + Spawn on new character on Allstar?

item.title: Xp rates + Spawn on new character on Allstar?
item.dc:creator: @IconsOfEvil IconsOfEvil
item.description:
@IconsOfEvil wrote:

Yep, Go too the “Player” file and Scroll down, until you see something like this: (Don’t scroll too far, its right after where you change the new char outfit)

1234 // 1234
5678 // 5678

Just add in your coords as shown.

Read full topic
